Class CounterWeightGarageDoorAnimationComponent

java.lang.Object

public class CounterWeightGarageDoorAnimationComponent extends Object implements IAnimationComponent
Represents a Animator for GarageDoors.

      animator - The animator responsible for the animation.
      animatedBlocks - The animated blocks for which to execute the animation step.
